# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Editor directories and files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Dependencies
node_modules/
bower_components/

# Build output
dist/
build/
*.log

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.production

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
.cache/

# Backup files
*.bak
backup/

# Compiled files
*.min.css
*.min.js

# Package files
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.rar

# Image source files (keep only optimized versions)
*.psd
*.ai
*.sketch

# Documentation build
docs/_build/

# Testing
coverage/
.nyc_output/

# Local development
.sass-cache/
*.css.map
*.js.map
